code:
-spec min_sum(Nums1 :: [integer()], Nums2 :: [integer()]) -> integer().
min_sum(Nums1, Nums2) ->
    Zeroes1 = length([X || X <- Nums1, X == 0]),
    Zeroes2 = length([X || X <- Nums2, X == 0]),
    Sum1 = lists:sum(Nums1),
    Sum2 = lists:sum(Nums2),
    TotalZeroes = Zeroes1 + Zeroes2,
    if
        TotalZeroes == 0 ->
            if Sum1 == Sum2 -> Sum1; true -> -1 end;
        true ->
            Diff = abs(Sum1 - Sum2),
            Case1 = (Diff + TotalZeroes - abs(Zeroes1 - Zeroes2)) div TotalZeroes,
            Case2 = (Diff + TotalZeroes + abs(Zeroes1 - Zeroes2)) div TotalZeroes,
            if
                Sum1 == Sum2 ->
                    Sum1 + TotalZeroes;
                (Diff + TotalZeroes) rem TotalZeroes == 0 orelse (Diff + TotalZeroes + abs(Zeroes1 - Zeroes2)) rem TotalZeroes == 0 ->
                    max(Sum1, Sum2) + Case1 + (if Zeroes1 > 0 andalso Zeroes2 > 0 -> 0; true -> 1 end);
                true ->
                    -1
            end
    end.
